title: SOAP Today's Notes
body:
It's possible to have MediRecords display the content of Today's Notes in an order which follows the SOAP (Subjective, Objective, Assessment, Plan) for the patient.
To enable this setting, go to your User Preferences, and tick the box to the left of SOAP Today's Notes, then click Save.

If ticked, the notes content will follow the sequence below:

Reason for visit
Observation
Health Assessment
Aqol4d
Diabetes
K10Assessment
Mentalhealth Risk
Mini Mental
Examination
Reviews
INR
Medication Review
Diagnosis
Allergies & Reaction
Current Medication
Prescription
Immunisation
Clinical Image/Drawing
Hospitalisation
Procedure
Pathology Request
Radiology Request
Result
Correspondence Out
Correspondence In
Obstetrics
Antenatal
Cervical Smears
Letter
Medical Certificate
  For further information regarding Today's Notes, click here.
